You do not have to burn this to a CD.

You can download DAEMON Tools for free and "mount" the images.

The way I do it is by right clicking the red DAEMON Tools icon in the taskbar, setting it to 1 devices and then mounting the image making sure all file types are selected in the browse window.

It should run exactly like a CD.

Either that or you can burn it using Nero's Burning ROM.

I can confirm they both work fine under Vista 64 bit.

 Used Alcohol to mount and install .. no troubles.

 Was no need for any updates .. or to change any color settings either.

If anybody is having troubles with the sound files, make sure that during install you chose custom installation and select the option to copy the level files onto your hard drive.

Works great.
